attributes.action: Get our lives back to normal.
attributes.additional_details: If COVID doesn’t kill us, our mental health will. There’s lots of illnesses and viruses that are deadly, but none of them has stopped the world like this has. Let us get back on track to getting back to our normal daily lives.
attributes.background:
We know the risks of COVID. End restrictions and end local lockdowns. Let the public be smart about our decisions; with distancing, masks and hygiene. And self isolating when necessary. 
Stop us feeling like prisoners.
